boons.name: Frost Strike
boons.description: Your Attack is stronger and inflicts Chill.
boons.notes: Tier 1

boons.name: Frost Flourish
boons.description: Your Special is stronger and inflicts Chill.
boons.notes: Tier 1

boons.name: Crystal Beam
boons.description: Your Cast drops a crystal that fires a beam straight ahead for 5 sec.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Beam slowly alters trajectory to hit nearest enemy.
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Icy Flare
boons.description: Your Cast damages foes around you and inflicts Chill.
boons.notes: Tier 1

boons.name: Mistral Dash
boons.description: Your Dash shoots a gust ahead that inflicts Chill.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Gust travels in the same direction you are facing.
  • Range: 300

boons.name: Demeter's Aid
boons.description: Your Call creates a winter vortex for 5 Sec., deals damage every 0.25 Sec inflicting Chill.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Greater call bonus: increases duration to 15 Sec

boons.name: Frozen Touch
boons.description: After you take damage, damage and completely Chill your foe.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Applies 10 stacks of Chill

boons.name: Rare Crop
boons.description: Your Boons become Common, then gain Rarity every 3 Encounter(s).
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • This boon cannot be purged or exchange or upgraded via Ambrosia Delight from Eurydice or via poms.
  • Once taken, shows which Boons are being cultivated as part of the Boon Description.
  • If taken before the 4th zone, Temple of Styx, each small room before the reward counts as one encounter.

boons.name: Ravenous Will
boons.description: While you have no , take 10% less damage and deal more.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.

boons.name: Nourished Soul
boons.description: Any Health effects are more potent. Restore +30% now.
boons.notes:
Tier 1
  • Unsellable

boons.name: Snow Burst
boons.description: Whenever you Cast, damage nearby foes and inflict Chill.
boons.notes: Tier 2

boons.name: Arctic Blast
boons.description: Applying 10 stacks of Chill causes a blast, clearing the effect.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, or Snow Burst

boons.name: Killing Freeze
boons.description: Applying Chill to all enemies causes them to Slow and Decay.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • This boon cannot be upgraded via poms.
boons.prerequisites: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, or Snow Burst

boons.name: Glacial Glare
boons.description: Your Cast fires longer and inflicts Chill.
boons.notes:
Tier 2
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf

boons.name: Winter Harvest
boons.description:
Chill-affected foes shatter at 10% hp, inflicting Chill nearby.
  • Shatter Area Damage: 50
boons.notes: Tier 3
boons.prerequisites:
Requires two of three:
  • Arctic Blast, Ravenous Will, Killing Freeze

boons.name: Cold Embrace
boons.description:
Your Cast crystal fires its beam directly at you for 4 seconds.
  • Bonus Cast Damage: +30%
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Crystal Clarity
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Crystal Beam
  • Aphrodite: Heartbreak Strike, Passion Dash, Heartbreak Flourish, or Aphrodite's Aid

boons.name: Freezing Vortex
boons.description:
Your Cast inflicts Chill, but is smaller and moves slower.
  • Blade Rift size -15%
boons.notes: • Cannot be combined with Hunting Blades
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash
  • Ares: Slicing Shot, or Slicing Flare

boons.name: Crystal Clarity
boons.description:
Your Cast is stronger and tracks foes more effectively.
  • Beam Damage: +10%
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with Cold Embrace
  • Cannot be combined with Aspect of Beowulf
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Crystal Beam
  • Artemis: Artemis' Aid, Deadly Flourish, Deadly Strike, or Hunter Dash

boons.name: Stubborn Roots
boons.description:
While you have no Death/Stubborn Defiance your slowly recovers.
  • Life Regeneration: 1 (every 0.8 Sec.)
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Frost Strike, Mistral Dash, Frost Flourish, Crystal Beam, or Demeter's Aid
  • Athena: Divine Strike, Divine Flourish, Phalanx Shot, Divine Dash, or Athena's Aid

boons.name: Ice Wine
boons.description:
Your Cast blasts an area with freezing Festive Fog that inflicts Chill.
  • Blast Damage: +50%
boons.notes: • Cannot be combined with Blizzard Shot
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, Mistral Dash
  • Dionysus: Trippy Shot

boons.name: Blizzard Shot
boons.description:
Your Cast moves slowly, piercing foes and firing shards around it.
  • Shard Damage: 20
boons.notes:
• Cannot be combined with the Aspect of Beowulf
  • Cannot be combined with Curse of Drowning
  • Cannot be combined with Ice Wine
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash
  • Poseidon: Flood Shot

boons.name: Cold Fusion
boons.description:
Jolted status does not expire on your enemies' attacks.
  • Jolted duration: 10 Sec.
boons.prerequisites:
One of each:
  • Demeter: Demeter's Aid, Frost Flourish, Frost Strike, or Mistral Dash
  • Zeus: Static Discharge

curse.name: chill
curse.description: Victim is slowed by 4%. Effect can stack up to 10 times.
